Description.Text:
The 652-room Avanti Resort is primarily a family-oriented, leisure resort, located in the heart of Orlando's International Drive. Avanti Resort will be a new, shining beacon, in the heart of the activity and dining options on International Drive. You'll enjoy a spacious sandy beach area around a generous-sized pool. Plus, enjoy casual dining and beverage options without leaving the resort. You're connected to all the excitement all up and down International Drive, with the iRide Trolley, opening you up to dozens of entertainment and dining opportunities.

Close to Theme Parks, Water Parks and many shopping, entertainment and dining options, including Pointe Orlando. Walt Disney World: 10.3 miles; Universal: 3.5 miles; SeaWorld: 2.5 miles; Wet 'n Wild: 1.8 miles; Orlando Convention Center: 1/2 mile; Pointe Orlando: 1/2 mile.

24-hour Front Desk in Lobby,Concierge,Scheduled Theme Park Shuttles,Large pool with kid's "Playscape" area, surrounded by sandy beach, with zero-entry and ADA-compliant.

Interactive poolside activities and entertainment (seasonally)Game Room, featuring Wii and Nintendo games,State-of-the-art Fitness Center,WiFi Resort-wide and in all rooms/suites

The hotel resort fee includes WIFI throughout the property, Scheduled theme park shuttles, self-parking, unlimited local & 800-number phone calls, use of the fitness center, and business center access. Guests will be charged $5.00, plus tax, per room, per night, not included in the room rate.

Please note the Pool Bar and Grill, Game Room and Fitness Center will not open until April 1, 2013.

Superior King - Sleeps up to 2. Faces the pool/recreation area, with one king-size bed, and 353 square feet of space. Includes armoire for clothes storage. WiFi and daily housekeeping service included. Coin-operated laundry facilities available in each building. Non-smoking room.
Superior Double Queen - Sleeps up to 4. Faces the pool/recreation area, with two queen-size beds, and 353 square feet of space. Includes armoire for clothes storage. WiFi and daily housekeeping service included. Coin-operated laundry facilities available in each building. Non-smoking room.
Deluxe King - Sleeps up to 2. Standard view. One king-size bed with 353 square feet of space. Includes armoire for clothes storage. WiFi and daily housekeeping service included. Coin-operated laundry facilities available in each building. Non-smoking room.
Deluxe Double Queen - Sleeps up to 4. Standard view. Two queen-size beds, with 353 square feet of space. Armoire for clothes storage. WiFi and daily housekeeping service included. Coin-operated laundry facilities available in each building. Non-smoking room.
Premium Executive King Suite - Sleeps up to 4. With one king-size bed and queen-size sleeper sofa in the living area, this suite has 425 square feet of space. Includes a microwave oven, mini-fridge and armoire for clothes storage. WiFi and daily housekeeping service included. Coin-operated laundry facilities available in each building. Non-smoking room.
